    • Method Detail

      • wrapRequestedBrokerInstance

        protected org.apache.ojb.broker.PersistenceBroker wrapRequestedBrokerInstance(org.apache.ojb.broker.PersistenceBroker broker)
        This method overrides OJB's default broker wrapping mechanism. OJB 1.0.0 has a bug on the default Broker wrapper, which caused a memory leak, and was not that useful, we simply do not wrap the broker.
        Overrides:
        wrapRequestedBrokerInstance in class org.apache.ojb.broker.core.PersistenceBrokerFactoryDefaultImpl
